attributes.action: do his utmost to bring pressure to bear on all ISPs to remove pro-anorexia websites from their servers. If ISPs will not cooperate then please legislate against them.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Pro-anorexia sites are insidious and encourage young people to become dangerously thin and undernourished and in extreme cases die. Please sign this petition and help save young lives today!
